column17:
This pair of casual sneakers from the house of Prozone features faux leather upper with stitched detailing at the top. It comes with a reinforced heel collar and soft and padded footbed and tongue with branding. The outsole is tough and textured with patterned grooves.

Features
  • Brand: Prozone
  • Category: Casual Shoes
  • Material: Faux Leather
  • Colour: White
  • Pattern: Round toe Stitched
  • Style: Lace-Up

Style it up with your casual ensemble for a smart look.

Care Tip
Use a gentle cleaner and then apply a protective gel or conditioner to protect it from the elements
